snippet: Mr. Reisman won national championships, won and lost fortunes on wagers and moved crowds to laughter as an opening act for the Harlem Globetrotters.
abstract: Marty Reisman, a wizard at table tennis, sport in which he captured national championships, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Reisman won national championships, won and lost fortunes on wagers and moved crowds to laughter as an opening act for the Harlem Globetrotters.

headline.seo: Marty Reisman, 82, Wizard of Table Tennis, Dies
headline.main: Marty Reisman, 82, a Wizard of Table Tennis, Dies
headline.print_headline: Marty Reisman, 82, Dies; A Wizard of Table Tennis
